name: iPhone 15 Pro Max
description:
Experience the pinnacle of smartphone technology with the iPhone 15 Pro Max, crafted from aerospace-grade titanium.

Key Features:
- A17 Pro Chip for unparalleled performance
- Up to 1TB Storage
- 6.7-inch Super Retina XDR display with ProMotion
- All-day battery life (Up to 29 hours video playback)
- Advanced Pro camera system with 5x Telephoto
- Action Button for customizable quick access
- Weight: 221g
